wp_setcookie(.menu: string $username, string $password, boolean $already_md5, string $home, string $siteurl, boolean $remember

wp_setup_nav_menu_item(.info: Decorates a menu item object with the shared navigation menu item properties.

wp_signon(.info: Authenticates and logs a user in with "remember" capability.

wp_slash(.info: Add slashes to a string or array of strings.

wp_specialchars_decode(.info: Converts a number of HTML entities into their special characters.

wp_sprintf_l(.info: Localize list items before the rest of the content.

wp_star_rating(.info: Output a HTML element with a star rating for a given rating.

wp_stream_image(.info: Streams image in WP_Image_Editor to browser.

wp_strip_all_tags(.info: Properly strip all HTML tags including script and style

wp_style_add_data(.info: Add metadata to a CSS stylesheet.

wp_style_loader_src(.info: Administration Screen CSS for changing the styles.

wp_tempnam(.info: Returns a filename of a Temporary unique file.

wp_term_is_shared(.info: Determine whether a term is shared between multiple taxonomies.

wp_terms_checklist(.info: Output an unordered list of checkbox input elements labelled with term names.

wp_text_diff(.info: Displays a human readable HTML representation of the difference between two strings.

wp_title(.info: Display or retrieve page title for all areas of blog.

wp_transition_comment_status(.info: Call hooks for when a comment status transition occurs.

wp_transition_post_status(.info: Fires actions related to the transitioning of a post's status.

wp_trash_comment(.info: Moves a comment to the Trash

wp_trash_post(.info: Move a post or page to the Trash

wp_trim_excerpt(.info: Generates an excerpt from the content, if needed.

wp_trim_words(.info: Trims text to a certain number of words.

wp_unique_filename(.info: Get a filename that is sanitized and unique for the given directory.

wp_unique_post_slug(.menu: string $slug, integer $post_ID, string $post_status, string $post_type, integer $post_parent | string

wp_unique_term_slug(.info: Will make slug unique, if it isn't already.

wp_unslash(.info: Remove slashes from a string or array of strings.

wp_update_comment(.info: Updates an existing comment in the database.

wp_update_comment_count(.info: Updates the comment count for post(s).

wp_update_core(.info: This was once used to kick-off the Core Updater.

wp_update_custom_css_post(.info: Update the `custom_css` post for a given theme.

wp_update_nav_menu_item(.info: Save the properties of a menu item or create a new one.

wp_update_nav_menu_object(.info: Save the properties of a menu or create a new menu with those properties.

wp_update_plugin(.info: This was once used to kick-off the Plugin Updater.

wp_update_plugins(.info: Check plugin versions against the latest versions hosted on WordPress.org.

wp_update_post(.info: Update a post with new post data.

wp_update_term(.info: Update term based on arguments provided.

wp_update_term_count(.info: Updates the amount of terms in taxonomy.

wp_update_theme(.info: This was once used to kick-off the Theme Updater.

wp_update_themes(.info: Check theme versions against the latest versions hosted on WordPress.org.

wp_update_user(.info: Update a user in the database.

wp_upload_bits(.info: Create a file in the upload folder with given content.

wp_upload_dir(.info: Get an array containing the current upload directory's path and url.

wp_validate_boolean(.info: Filter/validate a variable as a boolean.

wp_validate_redirect(.info: Validates a URL for use in a redirect.

wp_verify_nonce(.info: Verify that correct nonce was used with time limit.

wp_version_check(.info: Check WordPress version against the newest version.

wp_widget_control(.info: Meta widget used to display the control form for a widget.

wp_widget_rss_process(.info: Process RSS feed widget data and optionally retrieve feed items.

wpautop(.info: Replaces double line-breaks with paragraph elements.

wpmu_admin_do_redirect(.info: Redirect a user based on $_GET or $_POST arguments.

wpmu_validate_user_signup(.info: Sanitize and validate data required for a user sign-up.

wpmu_welcome_notification(.info: Notify a user that their blog activation has been successful.
